title: Liability of the department
context: [ยง346-406] Liability of the department. The department or any of its employees who provide services under this part shall not be liable to a third person: (1) For any acts of the young adult; and (2) For injury to the young adult resulting from the negligence or act of a third person providing services or housing to the young adult. [L 2013, c 252, pt of ยง2]
